sanskrit_verse:
सीमायामविषह्यायां स्वयं राजैव धर्मवित् ।
प्रदिशेद्भूमिमेकेषामुपकारादिति स्थितिः ॥ ८.२६५॥
transliteration:
sīmāyām aviṣahyāyāṁ svayaṁ rājaiva dharmavit .
pradiśed bhūmimekeṣām upakārād iti sthitiḥ ..
sph_interpretive_translation: When territorial limits become irreconcilable, the King—who is the knower of Dharma—shall himself assign land to individuals for their welfare and sustenance.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority resides in the sovereign's direct alignment with Dharma
Causation arises from necessity rooted in territorial imbalance
Capacity-based responsibility mandates the ruler’s intervention when systemic structures fail
Restoration logic demands redistribution as a mechanism of societal equilibrium
Consciousness alignment requires governance to reflect divine order
executable_legal_axioms: IF territorial dispute exceeds adjudicative resolution THEN sovereign authority activates resource allocation protocol
IF individual lacks access to sustenance THEN state-initiated land assignment EXECUTES
IF systemic failure detected THEN ruler assumes direct causal responsibility UNTIL balance restored
IF welfare threshold breached THEN redistribution precedes adjudication
supreme_court_application: In cases where territorial disputes cannot be resolved through judicial means due to irreconcilable claims, the Supreme Court shall invoke sovereign directives empowering the head of state to allocate land directly for the purpose of restoring social and economic equilibrium without punitive measures against any party involved.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that unresolved spatial conflict necessitates sovereign action; anupūrvaśaḥ shows how unmet needs cascade into disorder; proportional responsibility lies with the governing consciousness to restore balance; non-punitive reality rule confirms that no entity bears fault but all participate in completion.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate sovereign land assignment process upon verified need
Establish mutual benefit agreements between affected parties
Deploy dharma-aligned mediators to ensure harmonious transition
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this directive originates. Dharma is restored through conscious sovereignty. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates.
